PASS_ERROR_MIN_LEN_6: The password must contain at least 6 characters.
PASS_ERROR_MIN_LEN_8: The password must contain at least 8 characters.
PASS_ERROR_MIN_LEN_16: The password must contain at least 16 characters.
PASS_ERROR_MAX_LEN_16: The password must be less than 16 characters.
PASS_ERROR_MAX_LEN_32: The password must be less than 32 characters.
PASS_ERROR_A_Z_NUM: The password must be a combination of letters and numbers.
PASS_ERROR_A_Z_NUM_BOTH_CASE: The password must be a combination of uppercase letters, lowercase letters, and numbers.
PASS_ERROR_SPECIAL_CHARS: The password must contain at least one symbol.
PASS_ERROR_REPEAT_3: The password cannot contain three repeated characters.
PASS_ERROR_REPEAT_5: The password cannot contain five repeated characters.
PASS_ERROR_REPEAT_8: The password cannot contain eight repeated characters.
